segments.text: Ann , stop bugging Jess and help me order something new . Lattes are so passe these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you try an Americano ? Espresso with water .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Go with a hammerhead then-espresso mixed with drip coffee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds better , but I hope it doesn't inspire me to take a hammer to the client's head .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , James . We'll get this case worked out in no time .
segments.speaker: S2
